legal.title: Legal
legal.subtitle: Important Documents
legal.description: Important documents and legal information for Plugged.in

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your data

content.intro: Welcome to Plugged.in ("we," "our," or "us"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service. Please read this privacy policy carefully.
content.disclaimer: If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the service.
content.note: IMPORTANT NOTE: Plugged.in is currently in Release Candidate status. This privacy policy may be updated as the service matures and additional features are implemented.
content.thirdParty: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third-party sites or services.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions for using our service

content.intro: By accessing or using Plugged.in, you agree to these Terms and any additional terms that may apply. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must not access or use Plugged.in.

responsibilities.title: Your Responsibilities
items: Use MCP servers and tools in compliance with applicable laws and regulations
Not use MCP servers for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Take responsibility for MCP servers you configure or deploy

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. When we do, we will post the updated terms on this page and update the 'Last Updated' date.

account.title: Account Terms
account.description: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times.
items: You are responsible for safeguarding the password
You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account
You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security
account.note: We reserve the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, or remove content in our sole discretion.

mcp.title: MCP Server Usage
mcp.description: When using MCP servers through our platform:
items: You understand that MCP servers may have their own terms and conditions
You are responsible for ensuring your usage complies with all applicable laws
We do not guarantee the availability or functionality of any MCP server
You use MCP servers at your own risk

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.description: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Plugged.in and its licensors.

content.title: Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability
content.thirdParty: The service may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by us. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services.

releaseCandidate.title: Release Candidate Notice
releaseCandidate.status: Plugged.in is currently in Release Candidate (RC) status.
releaseCandidate.note: This means that while the core functionality is implemented and tested, there may still be bugs, issues, or incomplete features.
items: The service may experience unexpected downtime or errors
Features may be added, modified, or removed without notice
Data loss may occur, though we make efforts to prevent it
Performance may vary and is not guaranteed

general.title: General Disclaimer
general.description: The information and services provided through Plugged.in are provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis.
general.risk: You expressly agree that your use of, or inability to use, the service is at your sole risk.

warranty.title: No Warranties
warranty.description: We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim and negate all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.
items: The service will function uninterrupted, secure or available at any particular time or location
Any errors or defects will be corrected
The service is free of viruses or other harmful components
The results of using the service will meet your requirements

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: In no event shall Plugged.in, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
liability.security: We cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data transmitted to our service.
liability.rcDisclaimer: During the Release Candidate phase, these limitations are especially important as the service is still being refined.

content.title: Contact Information
content.description: For any questions about these legal documents, please contact us

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below to send us a message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully
form.error: An error occurred while sending your message
form.demoNotice: This form is for demonstration purposes only. During the Release Candidate phase, please use the email address provided.

status.question: What is the current status of Plugged.in?
status.answer: Plugged.in is currently in Release Candidate status. This means that while the core functionality is complete, there may still be bugs or issues that need to be addressed before the final release.

bugs.question: How can I report a bug?
bugs.answer: You can report bugs by sending an email to support@plugged.in or by opening an issue on our GitHub repository. Please include detailed steps to reproduce the bug, along with any relevant error messages.

security.question: Is my data secure during the Release Candidate phase?
security.answer: While we implement standard security practices, during the Release Candidate phase, we recommend not storing sensitive information within the service. Please review our Privacy Policy for more information.

content.note: Note: During the Release Candidate phase, our support capabilities may be limited. We will do our best to respond to all inquiries in a timely manner.
